## Install from GitHub 

```{r eval=FALSE}
if (! require("devtools")) {
  
  install.packages("devtools", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")
}

devtools::install_github(repo = "kwb-r/kwb.utils", dependencies = TRUE)
```
